name: Euro PA
goal: Euro P.A. is a service agency for Public Affairs (PA) and Strategic Communication
interests: Audiovisual and Media, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Single market policies and law, Industry policies, Environment, External relations, Trade, Health, Research, Citizenship issues
